attributes.action: Donald Trump to be invited to the UK for a state visit in June.
attributes.additional_details: We further object to the threat he poses to our NHS and its further privatisation.
attributes.background: It has today been reported that the Queen is to invite Donald Trump to the UK for a state visit in June. We, the undersigned, do not wish such a visit to take place and do not wish to welcome him to this country given his record on treatment of immigrants and the vulnerable in the USA.
